archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0480
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a collections manager, I want customers in collections to have their interest free device blocked after a certain timeframe, so that they can't use it if they leave us and don't pay.

properties.value: It was commented that it is technically possible buy legally forbidden if any installment or upfront payment was done. It may be blocked only when there was no payment at all for the device.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
